Pattern Sample: Buttons

button--subtle <button class="button button--subtle">Button</button> <button class="button button--subtle" type="submit">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--subtle">Link button</a></button> <input class="button button--subtle" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button button--subtle" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--small <button class="button button--small">Button</button> <button type="submit" class="button button--small">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--small">Link button</a></button> <input class="button button--small" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button button--small" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--secondary <button class="button button--secondary">Button</button> <button class="button button--secondary" type="submit" >Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--secondary">Link button</a></button> <input class="button button--secondary" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button button--secondary" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
